metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38888 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross Site Scripting vulnerability in Dolibarr ERP CRM v.17.0.1 and before allows a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information and execute arbitrary code via the REST API module, related to analyseVarsForSqlAndScriptsInjection and testSqlAndScriptInject.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
